mapper.select: select d.`name` as `product_name`, j.`name` as `project_name`, crd.`amount` as `amount`, e1.`name` as `operator_name`, e2.`name` as `consultant_name`, e3.`name` as `sales_man_name` from consume_record_detail crd left join product d on d.`id`=crd.`product_id` left join project j on j.`id`=crd.`project_id` left join employee e1 on e1.`id`=crd.`operator_id` left join employee e2 on e2.`id`=crd.`consultant_id` left join employee e3 on e3.`id`=crd.`sales_man_id` where crd.`trade_serial_number`= #{tradeSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
